{{also|bank|Bánk|bänk|Bänk}} ==English== {{wikipedia|Bank, Hampshire}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|en|ang|banc||bank, hillock, embankment}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # A village in the [[New Forest]] in [[Hampshire]], [[England]]. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=abkn|Knab|knab|nabk}} [[Category:en:Villages in England]] ---- ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/baŋk/}} * {{audio|de|De-Bank.ogg|Bank}} * {{rhymes|de|aŋk}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|goh|banc}}, {{m|goh|bank||height}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*bankiz}}. Related to {{cog|osx|bank}}. ====Noun==== {{de-noun|f||Bänke}} # [[bench]] {{gloss|which people sit on}}; [[pew]] # [[workbench]] {{gloss|which things can be set down on}} # [[bank]] {{gloss|collection of material in a body of water}} # {{lb|de|football}} [[substitutes' bench]] =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-f|pl=Bänke}} =====Hyponyms===== {{der2|de |{{l|de|Austernbank||oyster bed, oyster reef}} |{{l|de|Drehbank}} |{{l|de|Fensterbank}} |{{l|de|Folterbank||torture rack}} |{{l|de|Fußbank}} |{{l|de|Hantelbank||weight bench}} |{{l|de|Hobelbank||carpenter's bench}} |{{l|de|Kirchenbank}} |{{l|de|Klopfbank}} |{{l|de|Korallenbank||coral reef}} |{{l|de|Nebelbank||fog bank}} |{{l|de|Sandbank}} |{{l|de|Schlachtbank||slaughterhouse}} {{qual|used figuratively}} |{{l|de|Schulbank||school desk}} |{{l|de|Sitzbank||bench}} |{{l|de|Sonnenbank||tanning bed, sunbed}} |{{l|de|Streckbank||torture rack}} |{{l|de|Werkbank||workbench}} |{{l|de|Wolkenbank||cloud bank}} }} =====Derived terms===== * {{l|de|auf die lange Bank schieben||to procrastinate, to shelve}} * {{l|de|Bänkelsänger||minstrel}} ===Etymology 2=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|it|banco||bench, bank}}, from the same {{der|de|goh|-}} word {{m|goh|banc}}, {{m|goh|bank||height}} as above. ====Noun==== {{de-noun|f||Banken}} # [[bank]] {{gloss|financial institution}} # a [[facility]] for [[storage]] of a particular thing: =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} =====Hyponyms===== {{der2|de |{{l|de|Blutbank}} |{{l|de|Bundesbank}} |{{l|de|Datenbank}} |{{l|de|Landesbank}} |{{l|de|Notenbank}} |{{l|de|Samenbank}} |{{l|de|Staatsbank||state bank}} |{{l|de|Weltbank}} |{{l|de|Zentralbank}} }} =====Derived terms===== {{der2|de |Bankgeheimnis |Bankier |Bankkauffrau |Bankkaufmann |Banknote }} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/baŋk/|[bɑŋk]}} ** {{rhymes|lb|ɑŋk}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|f}} # [[bank]] (financial institution) ---- ==Pennsylvania German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pdc|goh|bank}}.
